entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog at times. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog at times in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 4 May 2023
